reason: Bitcoin demonstrates weakness against gold and equities, coupled with institutional investors snubbing high-yield BTC products. Renewed quantum computing fears for Bitcoin and ongoing regulatory uncertainty further contribute to a cautious outlook, suggesting potential for continued distribution or downward pressure in the immediate term.
headlines: Here is why investors are snubbing Michael Saylor’s 10% dividend offer in Europe
R3 bets on Solana to bring institutional yield onchain
Ethereum Foundation makes post quantum security a top priority as new team forms
Bitcoin’s weakness versus gold and equities puts quantum computing fears back in focus
Senate Agriculture's crypto market structure draft peppered with Democrat pitches
